file_content.text: Now is the time to grant my favor.
I have guided you. Now I request your help.
I need to live in your skin. Seize control of you. You will be unchanged and not feel a thing.
Let you take control of me? You're out of your mind!
Not going to happen.
What are you going to do?
For what purpose?
You cannot know. But I will pay you for your service.
What's stopping you from doing it whether I agree or not?
Why do you ask permission?
We are in balance now. So I am the asker. You have the choice. And if granted, I will pay a price.
Agree to this. I only require your body for a few moments.
Sorry, that's beyond what I'm willing to do.
No.
Then I am no longer your guide.
I grant permission.
I trust you.
I like the idea of you owing me.
I expect compensation.
The agreement is made....
It is done. Thank you.
I'm pleased to help.
You're welcome.
When your journey is at a close, you will see me again. And I will bear a gift.
I guess I'll have to continue on not understanding any of this.
Wish I knew what you did.
It will remain a mystery until it no longer is. Then I will appear to you again.
Do I have to suffer you any longer?
Are we done now?
No. We both have what we need. You will see me again.
The Blessing shows the door to the Dark Heart chamber; the Pendant unlocks it.
To the Dark Heart. Find what you seek.
To access the Dark Heart, return to the Nightmare Lands and complete Murbek Gehn's instructions.
To access the Dark Heart, see Murbek Gehn in the Nightmare Lands. He is one of your kind.
You helped greatly.
The Gormak warmaster is dead. I've come to collect the Pendant of Bone.
The Three will know of your assistance.
My talisman is yours.
I would have killed you if you failed to follow through.
Lucky you didn't renege.
Everything costs.
Farewell.
You have my gratitude.
It is the Voss way.
It's about time.
Long overdue.
Payment comes when earned.
Voss will avenge....
You now possess the Blessing of Oneness and the Pendant of Bone.
Slay the last Gormak warmaster and receive my talisman.
The outsider returns.
You killed the Gormak chieftains.
You want my talisman. Why?
Why did you assume my mission?
It was the only way to get an audience with you.
To bring you here.
The enemy of the Voss is my enemy.
I am a friend of your people.
Just say thank you.
You're welcome.
I need that talisman around your neck.
The Pendant of Bone? It is a charm. No monetary value or power. Why?
My reasons are my own.
It's personal.
I need it to gain entrance to the center of the Dark Heart.
It will open a door.
You're mad.
I don't have time to talk about it. Give it to me.
Just hand it over.
The Bone gives me no advantage. To profit from it is good. I will award it, for a price.
You killed enemy chieftains, but the Gormak warmaster lives. Defeat him. The talisman will be yours.
It's a deal.
I could just take it off your corpse.
How about I kill you?
Then there will never be an alliance between Voss and the Empire.
If everyone's dead, no one will know.
No survivors, then. [Attack]
This petty planet means nothing to me.
I don't care. [Attack]
Don't get greedy. I already did your job.
Haven't I done enough?
To get a meeting. This gets you the talisman.
I'll suffer no more conditions.
I'll just take it. [Attack]
Men, attack!
All right, I'll enable your laziness.
Fine. If you can't handle it.
I understand and respect your culture.
It's the Voss way.
You will receive the talisman when the warmaster is dead.
My lord, I am faint....
Did it just get really hot in here...?
Master, I am stricken....
My strength is gone....
Whoa, major head rush, I....
We fall....
Your comrade has fallen. The fight is more in our favor.
My lord, the strangest thing--Vette has collapsed for no apparent reason. She's alive but unable to function.
Just let her rest.
Keep her still.
Tell her to snap out of it.
Unacceptable.
If I don't respect the Voss way, that seems to be the result.
I think it's my fault.
I'll just make sure she remains resting. Please continue with your work.
My lord, the mysterious illness has struck again....
Now, not only am I barely able to function, Vette has collapsed as well.
Now Vette has collapsed.
Tell her to shape up.
Unacceptable.
Don't let her push herself unnecessarily.
Make sure she rests.
Now, not only am I ailing and barely functioning, Lieutenant Pierce has collapsed as well.
Now Lieutenant Pierce has collapsed.
Tell him to shape up.
Unacceptable.
Don't let him push himself unnecessarily.
Make sure he rests.
Now, I have fallen victim to the weakness.
Shape up, Captain.
Get over it.
Do not tax yourself further, Captain.
Rest then.
Stop interrupting me with bad news.
I don't want to hear it.
Yes, my lord.
Pierce, send someone to come pick up Quinn.
I'm still under the weather, so it won't be me. But it'll get done, my lord.
On my way.
Quinn, send someone to come pick up Pierce.
Quinn, send someone to come pick up Vette.
Quinn, send someone to come pick up Jaesa.
Quinn, send someone to come pick up Broonmark.
I am still ill, or I'd do it myself. But it will be done, my lord.
Right away, my lord.
